pr_title: remove incorrect and unnecessary overrides from BooleanVectorValueMatcher

timeline.message: remove incorrect and unnecessary overrides from BooleanVectorValueMatcher

timeline.bodyText: nit: maybe good to have unit tests for future proof.
timeline.author: jihoonson

timeline.message: add unit tests for ... part of VectorValueMatcherColumnProcessorFactory

timeline.author: maytasm

replies.bodyText:
With cardinality of 0, ValueMatchers.toBooleanIfPossible will return 'false' from the path from 
  
    
      druid/processing/src/main/java/org/apache/druid/query/filter/vector/SingleValueStringVectorValueMatcher.java
    
    
         Line 62
      in
      17cf8ea
    
    
    
    

        
          
           final VectorValueMatcher booleanMatcher = toBooleanMatcherIfPossible(selector, s -> Objects.equals(s, etnValue)); 
        
    
  

, which will make a false boolean matcher, so the current test is correct afaict.
replies.author: clintropolis
